set.name: Functional_Tests
set.description: Functional and Dataflow test cases for Bluetooth

case.name: NFT-BT-Device_Scan_C-ITER
case.description: Purpose Test basic Bluetooth scan reliability Method Test case uses libbluetooth3 library and C-API, scan is made 80 times. Pre-/Post-Conditions None Pass/Fail Criteria Is able to run the scan uninterrupted. Test case result can be found from /var/log/tests

step.stdout: <testreport> <measures> <measure name="passed iterations" description="passed iterations" value="80" unit="passed iterations" fail="79" target="80" /> </measures> </testreport>
